name: Barrhead Commercial Property for lease or sale
overview:
Commercial space in Barrhead suitable for office, retail, non-profit or mixed-use tenants. Open floor plan and easily customizable. Ample space to build an expansion, warehouse, or detached structure.
This Barrhead property offers flexible configurations for a variety of business types.
additionalDetails:
Concrete block building with built up roof. Originally constructed in 1983.

Former Alberta Transportation building.
highlights: Ample yard space for storage or future development
Could be easily adapted to multiple tenants
Easy access to Highway 18, in Barrhead's NE industrial area.
